title: WÄ™gierski pacjent
description: True story of a young man, who had spent few decades in psychariatric hospital in USSR and later Russian Federation. Young Hungarian, Andras Toma, was enlisted for Hungarian troops created to fight on Nazi side. After fights and marching he landed in gulag and later in psychariatric hospital. He hadn't learn Russian, even while being forced to do so, cause he didn't want to. He was found and identified after nearly 60 years.
author: Andras Veer
